data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Tag ali s Stål, 1860 (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Saicinae) from Colombia with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castro-Huertas, Valentina, Forero, Dimitri (2014): First record of the genus Tag ali s Stål, 1860 (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Saicinae) from Colombia with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 3838 (4): 475-485, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3838.4.6
